title: Pride Of Britain: Delilah Hamlin packs on the PDA with Love Island boyfriend Eyal Booker
text:
They looked absolutely smitten as they took to the red carpet hours earlier.

And Eyal Booker and Delilah Hamlin continued their besotted display as they puckered up for a saucy smooch while exiting the 2019 Pride of Britain Awards at the Grosvenor House Hotel in London on Monday.

The former Love Islander, 24, couldn't take his attention away from the American beauty, 21, as they packed on the PDA while heading home.

Sealed with a kiss: Eyal Booker, 24, and Delilah Hamlin, 21, puckered up for a smooch while exiting the 2019 Pride of Britain Awards at the Grosvenor House Hotel in London on Monday

Smitten Eyal was then seen walking hand-in-hand with the stunning brunette back to the taxi.

Their loved-up display continued in the back of the taxi as they giggled away while cosying up for the journey home.

Hours earlier, Eyal looked dapper in a black three-piece suit with a velvet floral pattern, while his girlfriend stunned in a leggy black gown.

Fresh from his live X Factor: Celebrity performance on Saturday night, Eyal caught the eye in his smart black blazer and trousers with a matching waistcoat.

Romance: The former Love Islander couldn't take his attention away from the American beauty as they packed on the PDA while heading home

Hot couple: Smitten Eyal was then seen walking hand-in-hand with the stunning brunette back to the taxi

Babe: Delilah continued to showcase her fabulous figure as she strutted along with her man

The star teamed his ensemble with a crisp white shirt, black bow tie and shiny black shoes.

Delilah meanwhile was dressed to impress in a floor length black gown which featured mesh cut-outs and a daring thigh-high split.

Further showcasing her slender pins, she added a pair of simple black heels to her look.

Happy: Their loved-up display continued in the back of the taxi as they giggled away while cosying up for the journey home

Matching: Hours earlier, the pair sported coordinated black velvet numbers at the 2019 Pride of Britain Awards

Flawless: looked dapper in a black three-piece suit with a velvet floral pattern, while his girlfriend, 21, stunned in a leggy black gown

Delilah, the daughter of US reality star Lisa Rinna, styled her brunette tresses into sleek waves, while she added a glam layer of make-up and silver hoop earrings.

The couple looked happier than ever as they cosied up to each other at the star-studded event.

More than 100 of the UK's biggest stars will come together at the Daily Mirror Pride of Britain Awards to honour the nation's unsung heroes on the landmark 20th anniversary of the event.

The awards recognise and celebrate ordinary people up and down the country doing extraordinary things.

Hosted by Carol Vorderman, celebrities and public figures including Prince Charles, Robert Downey Jr, Sir Ben Kingsley, Dua Lipa, Ant & Dec, Chris Pratt, Michael Sheen, Adam Lambert, Christine Lampard, Sir Michael Caine, Jonathan Ross, Suranne Jones, and the judges and casts of Strictly Come Dancing and X Factor will be honouring this year's awe-inspiring winners.

Smitten: Eyal has had little luck with past romances as he enrolled himself on Love Island and Celebs Go Dating to find the perfect woman in 2018 [pictured on Tuesday]

Carol Vorderman said: 'Pride of Britain is such a huge part of my life, it's hard to believe it's 20 years since we first started. In that time, it has found a place at the heart of British life, and the winners represent the very best of us. I never fail to be humbled by them, and this year's are no different.'

Eyal has had little luck with past romances as he enrolled himself on Love Island and Celebs Go Dating to find the perfect woman in 2018.

He struck up a blossoming romance with model Hayley Hughes, 22, on Love Island on the first day but the pair dramatically uncoupled after a few days on the show.

He quickly moved on with Megan Barton Hanson, 25, and the couple were the first to get steamy between the sheets on the 2018 series.

However, Megan soon pied off the spiritual hunk when she decided to pursue a romance with Wes Nelson, then 21.

During the Love Island Christmas reunion, Eyal shared a kiss with former shoe shop worker Kendall Rae Knight, 27, but the romance soon fizzled out.

Delilah appears to have something of a penchant for Love Island boys as she was seen looking cosy with Adam Collard, 23, in Los Angeles in April.
description: Eyal Booker and Delilah Hamlin puckered up for a saucy smooch while exiting the 2019 Pride of Britain Awards at the Grosvenor House Hotel in London on Monday.
